import React, { Component } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { DataContext } from "./Context" import "./Header.css" import logo from "../logo.png" import CartItems from "./Cart/CartItems" import cartimg from "../cartimg.png" import cartimgitems from "../cartimgitems.png" class Header extends Component { static contextType = DataContext state = { modalIsOpen: false } render() { const { categories, updateCurrency, currentCurrency, cart, total } = this.context const { modalIsOpen } = this.state const count = Object.values(cart).reduce((sum, cartItem) => { const { qty } = cartItem return sum + qty }, 0) return (
{categories.map(({ name }) => (
  • {name}
))}
{(count < 1) &&
this.setState({ modalIsOpen: !modalIsOpen })} />
} {(count >= 1) &&
this.setState({ modalIsOpen: !modalIsOpen })} />
{count}
} {modalIsOpen &&
this.setState({ modalIsOpen: false })} >
event.stopPropagation()} >
My Bag {`${count} items`}
Total: {categories[0].products[0].prices[currentCurrency].currency.symbol}{" "}{total}
}
) } } export default Header
